scripts.build-dotnet: dotnet run -c Release bench-compiler.fsproj out-node && node transform out-node --commonjs
scripts.build-dotnet-opt: dotnet run -c Release bench-compiler.fsproj out-node --optimize-fcs && node transform out-node --commonjs
scripts.build-library: yarn babel ../../../../build/fable-library --out-dir out-node/fable-library && yarn babel util.js --out-dir out-node
scripts.build-node: node out-node/app bench-compiler.fsproj out-node2 && node transform out-node2 --commonjs
scripts.build-test-node: node out-node/app ../../../../../fable-test/fable-test.fsproj out-test && node transform out-test --commonjs
scripts.build-test-dotnet: dotnet run -c Release ../../../../../fable-test/fable-test.fsproj out-test && node transform out-test --commonjs
scripts.build-test-dotnet-opt: dotnet run -c Release ../../../../../fable-test/fable-test.fsproj out-test --optimize-fcs && node transform out-test --commonjs
scripts.build-tests-node: node out-node/app ../../../../tests/Main/Fable.Tests.fsproj out-tests && node transform out-tests --commonjs
scripts.build-tests-dotnet: dotnet run -c Release ../../../../tests/Main/Fable.Tests.fsproj out-tests && node transform out-tests --commonjs
scripts.build-tests-dotnet-opt: dotnet run -c Release ../../../../tests/Main/Fable.Tests.fsproj out-tests --optimize-fcs && node transform out-tests --commonjs
